cookie.groupDescription: Marketing cookies used to track visitors across the store to provide personalization, offers and promotions.
cookie.ddEnabledCookieDescription: This cookie is required for the correct functioning of the Dotdigital app.

cookie.ddTrackingCookieDescription: This cookie is placed when a contact clicks a tracked link in a Dotdigital campaign and returns to your store.
